Headline: #68 Northwest Highway Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Northwest Highway/Ozark
ShortDescription: EB 68 Northwest Highway buses temp rrtd via Northwest Highway, Ozark, Canfield, Devon & Northwest Highway, due to street blockage near Northwest Highway/Ozark.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #68 Northwest Highway buses are temporarily rerouted via Northwest Highway, Ozark, Canfield, Devon and then resume their normal route at Northwest Highway, due to street blockage near Northwest Highway/Ozark.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
